# archistra

Enterprise minimalist glass landing page.

## Save generated files to local macOS path

Use the helper script to copy generated files (`index.html`, `README.md`) to a macOS absolute path:

```bash
./scripts/save_generated_files.sh /Users/shivmohan/Documents/workspace/archistra
```

If no path is provided, it defaults to:

```text
/Users/shivmohan/Documents/workspace/archistra
```
